mapper.insert:
insert into x_user

password,
is_admin,

add_time,

password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_admin = #{isAdmin,jdbcType=TINYINT},

add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
